title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 106
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app 106

State Regulations
NACC C-21
(Auth Reg ยง 2012.1)
STATE OF NEW YORK NARCOTIC ADDICTION CONTROL COMMISSION
N. A.C.C. NO. ________
N. Y.S.I.I.S. NO. ________
WARRANT FOR RETURN FROM AFTERCARE STATUS TO
TREATMENT CENTER
TO ANY NARCOTIC REHABILITATION OFFICER, NARCOTIC CORRECTION
OFFICER, NARCOTIC PAROLE OFFICER, WARRANT OFFICER, OR OTHER PERSON AUTHORIZED
TO RETURN ADDICTS TO TREATMENT CENTERS
Pursuant to the authority granted by Article 9 of the Mental

Hygiene Law and the regulations of the Narcotic Addiction Control Commission, I
hereby Order that ________, a certified narcotic addict placed upon aftercare
supervision by the Narcotic Addiction Control Commission and remaining in the
legal custody of the Commission be returned to the physical custody of the said

Commission by arresting, detaining, and delivering the said certified addict to
________, a treatment center of the said Commission, or to any other treatment
center otherwise designated by the Commission, and for so doing, this shall be
your sufficient Warrant. NEW YORK STATE NARCOTIC ADDICTION
CONTROL COMMISSION
Dated: ________, 19________ Per
____________
Authorized Signature
____________
Typed Signature
____________
Address
________
Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. tit. 14, Appendices, app
106

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
